mapper.select: SELECT d.dob_code, u.user_id, d.dob_nickname, u.user_name, u.phone, u.regist_datetime, o.order_datetime, dobby_service_count FROM tbl_user u JOIN tbl_dobby d on (dob_code = u.user_code) LEFT JOIN (select user_code, MAX(order_datetime) as order_datetime from tbl_order group by user_code) o ON (u.user_code=o.user_code) LEFT JOIN (select dob_code, count(*) as dobby_service_count from tbl_service group by dob_code) s ON (u.user_code=s.dob_code) WHERE auth != 'ADMIN';

SELECT d.dob_code, d.dob_nickname, d.dob_img, d.dob_content, d.dob_area, d.dob_career_days, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.phone, u.email u.regist_datetime, s.service_code, s.service_title, s.service_explain s.service_price, s.service_status, s.service_created, s.thumbnail_url, o.order_datetime FROM tbl_user u JOIN tbl_dobby d on (d.dob_code = u.user_code) JOIN tbl_service s on (d.dob_code = s.dob_code) JOIN tbl_order o on (s.service_code = o.service_code);
